title: Thorn Blade
content:
Thorn Blade Rare 2~7 Damage 1d6+1 Slashing Poisonous Synergy: While concentrating, your melee weapon attacks deal an additional 1-4 Poison damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Ensnaring Strike (Melee) Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This Blade is sharp and slender as a serpent's fang - and just as likely to inflict a hideous sting. Scimitar Light Finesse 1.35 190

Poisonous Synergy: While concentrating, your melee weapon attacks deal an additional 1-4 Poison damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1
